characterDescription.skinTone: Light beige skin tone with subtle pink undertones, especially visible on cheeks and nose, even complexion overall
characterDescription.eyeColor: Steel blue eyes with slightly darker outer ring and minimal limbal ring visibility
characterDescription.eyeShape: Almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at the outer corners, with visible upper eyelids and moderate eyelashes
characterDescription.hairColor: Dark ash brown hair with natural blonde highlights scattered throughout, more prominent at the crown of the head
characterDescription.hairTexture: Fine hair texture, slightly wavy and thin, with a tendency to frizz at the ends, particularly around the face
characterDescription.hairStyle: Hair pulled back into a messy bun or ponytail at the top of the head, with loose strands framing the face and neck, shorter hairs near forehead stand straight up
characterDescription.faceShape: Oval face with prominent cheekbones, a defined jawline gradually coming to a point at the chin, and a high forehead.
characterDescription.nose: Small to medium sized nose with a straight bridge and a rounded tip, nostrils are not flared and seem symmetrical
characterDescription.lips: Naturally pink lips, slightly asymmetrical with the upper lip being thinner than the lower lip, mouth is wide
characterDescription.smile: Wide, joyful smile revealing both upper and lower teeth, a noticeable gap between the two front upper incisors
characterDescription.eyebrows: Medium-thick eyebrows, naturally arched and slightly darker than the hair color, well-defined but not overly groomed
characterDescription.ears: Ears are mostly obscured but appear to be medium-sized and close to the head.
characterDescription.cheeks: Defined cheekbones and slightly sunken cheeks, especially noticeable when smiling.
characterDescription.facialProportions: Balanced facial proportions, with eyes taking up a significant portion of the face and the nose being approximately 1/3 of the face's length.
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Gap between the two front upper incisors. Blonde hair highlights scattered throughout. Noticeable pink undertones to the skin, especially on the cheeks. Wearing a silver chain necklace.
characterDescription.overallImpression: Energetic and cheerful appearance, with defined facial features and a playful expression.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This child is estimated to be between 7-8 years old, with light beige skin that has subtle pink undertones, particularly on her cheeks. Her eyes are a striking steel blue with darker outer rims, and they are almond-shaped, giving her a slightly downturned look. She has dark ash brown hair featuring natural blonde highlights and fine hair texture that is swept back into a messy bun. She has a wide joyful smile showing a distinct gap between her two front upper incisors, oval face shape, medium nose with slight point to chin, and wears a silver chain necklace with her name on it.
